name: Academics at GASP
description: Supporting students with their homework and academic development is crucial for their overall success. By working closely with school day staff and teachers, they can provide the support and guidance students need to thrive academically. Collaborating with teachers allows them to understand each student's individual needs and tailor their approach accordingly. This partnership ensures that students receive consistent instruction and reinforcement, bridging the gap between school and the after-sc

howToGetIt: The Registration Process will be to fill out and return the family packet and liability waiver to the GASP Office. They will invite families to register via our online registration system, iCare. Returning families will be asked to make sure that their information in iCare is current. If you have questions, please email gasp.grattan@gmail.com Go to [https://www.gasp-grattan.org/enrollment-page] for forms and enrollment information.
cost: Full Time Regular Pick: $500.00 Part Time (any 3 days-regular pick up): $425.00 Sibling Discount: 10% (Applies to one sibling only). Tuition assistance available.
